object.name: UEService.Capabilities.
object.description: This object contains parameters relating to the hardware capabilities of the UE server.

parameter.name: IMSI
parameter.description: IMSI (International Mobile Subscriber Identity) is the subscribers permanent identity.

parameter.name: EmmState
parameter.description: Mobility management state EMM-REGISTERED, EMM-DEREGISTERED.

parameter.name: GUTI
parameter.description: Globally Unique Temporary Identity.

parameter.name: MeIdentity
parameter.description: Mobile Equipment Identity - (e.g. IMEI/IMEISV) Software Version Number.

parameter.name: Tracking Area List
parameter.description: Current Tracking area list.

parameter.name: LastVisitedTai
parameter.description: A TAI which is contained in the TA list the UE registered to the network

parameter.name: SelectedNasAlgorithm
parameter.description: Selected NAS security algorithm.

parameter.name: SelectedAsAlgorithm
parameter.description: Selected AS security algorithms.

parameter.name: KSI_ASME
parameter.description: Key Set Identifier for the main key KASME.

parameter.name: K_ASME
parameter.description: Main key for E-UTRAN key hierarchy based on CK, IK and Serving network identity.

parameter.name: NasKeysAndCount
parameter.description: KNASint, KNASenc, and NAS COUNT parameter.

parameter.name: EUtranUtranKeySetflag
parameter.description: Indicates whether the UE is using security keys derived from UTRAN or E-UTRAN security association

parameter.name: TIN
parameter.description: Temporary Identity Used in Next update (TIN) in the Attach Request and RAU/TAU Request

parameter.name: UESpecificDrxParameters
parameter.description: Preferred E-UTRAN DRX cycle length

parameter.name: PDNConnectionListNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

parameter.name: ApnInUse
parameter.description: The APN currently used. APN Network Identifier and the APN Operator Identifier.

parameter.name: ApnAmbr
parameter.description: The maximum aggregated uplink and downlink MBR to be shared across all NonGBR bearers.

parameter.name: AssignedPdnType
parameter.description: The PDN Type assigned by the network (IPv4, IPv6, or IPv4v6).

parameter.name: IPAddress
parameter.description: IPv4 address and/or IPv6 prefix

parameter.name: DefaultBearer
parameter.description: Identifies the default bearer within the PDN connection by its EPS Bearer Id.

parameter.name: EPSBearerListNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: UEService.UEContext.BearerContextList.{i}.PDNConnectionList.{i}.EPSBearerList.{i}.
object.description: The following entries defining the EPS Bearer specific parameters are included within the set of parameters defining the PDN Connection.

parameter.name: EPSBearerId
parameter.description: An EPS bearer identity uniquely identifies an EPS bearer for one UE accessing via E-UTRAN.

parameter.name: TI
parameter.description: Transaction Identifier

parameter.name: EPSBearerQoS
parameter.description: GBR and MBR for GBR bearer.

parameter.name: TFT
parameter.description: Traffic Flow Template
